Name: Basil Crush
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Green and herbal to the extent of almost being healthy. Bitter sweet and fruity.
History: This drink for Basil Brush fans is adapted from a recipe by Fabio Raffaelli, Restaurante Tristan, Mallorca.
